## Description {#details}

A scope for locals.

A legal scope for lexical blocks, local variables, and debug info locations. Subclasses are <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/disubprogram">DISubprogram</a></em>, <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilexicalblock">DILexicalBlock</a></em>, and <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilexicalblockfile">DILexicalBlockFile</a></em>.

Definition at line 1675 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getNonLexicalBlockFileScope() {#a2ec57fadd1270b2120bcebc3c416422f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DILocalScope &#42; DILocalScope::getNonLexicalBlockFileScope () const</>}>
Get the first non <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilexicalblockfile">DILexicalBlockFile</a> scope of this scope.

Return this if it&#39;s not a <em>DILexicalBlockFIle</em>; otherwise, look up the scope chain.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l01700">1700</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp/#l01057">1057</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfometadata-cpp">DebugInfoMetadata.cpp</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DISubprogram &#42; DILocalScope::getSubprogram () const</>}>
Get the subprogram for this scope.

Return this if it&#39;s an <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/disubprogram">DISubprogram</a></em>; otherwise, look up the scope chain.
